name: start
description: Starting point

name: why
description: The Capabilities Space - “Why” are we analyzing this content?

name: where
description: The Search Space - “Where” does the analytic focus?

name: what
description: The Feature Space - “What” features does the analytic use?

name: deepfake
description: Media manipulated using deep learning algorithms placing identifiable entities in fictitious situations

name: manual-forgery
description: Manually manipulated media

name: out-of-context
description: Media taken out of context

name: synthetic-media
description: Fully synthetic media content

name: human
description: Analytic extracts human data and focuses only on that

name: non-human
description: Analytic extracts non-human data and focuses on that

name: scene
description: Analytic focuses on the whole scene

name: file
description: Analytic focuses on the file

name: deepfake-video
description: Videos manipulated using deep learning algorithms placing identifiable entities in fictitious situations

name: deepfake-audio
description: Audio manipulated using deep learning algorithms placing identifiable entities in fictitious situations

name: deepfake-image
description: Images manipulated using deep learning algorithms placing identifiable entities in fictitious situations

name: synthetic-image
description: Fully synthetic image

name: synthetic-video
description: Fully synthetic video

name: synthetic-audio
description: Fully synthetic audio

name: synthetic-text
description: Fully synthetic text

name: deepfake-text
description: Text manipulated using deep learning algorithms to imitate an identifiable entity

name: reenactment
description: Videos where an identifiable entity is manipulated using a driver video to perform actions

name: faceswap
description: Videos where an identifiable entity's face is swapped

name: manual-forgery-video
description: Manipulated video content created through manual editing

name: manual-forgery-audio
description: Manipulated audio content created through manual editing

name: manual-forgery-image
description: Manipulated image content created through manual editing

name: manual-forgery-text
description: Manipulated text content created through manual editing

name: human-face
description: Analytic extracts human face data and focuses only on that

name: human-mouth
description: Analytic extracts human mouth data and focuses only on that

name: human-eye
description: Analytic extracts human eye data and focuses only on that

name: human-ear
description: Analytic extracts human ear data and focuses only on that

name: human-voice
description: Analytic extracts human voice data and focuses only on that

name: human-body
description: Analytic extracts human body data and focuses only on that

name: human-handwriting
description: Analytic extracts handwriting data and focuses only on thatg

name: human-text
description: Analytic extracts text data and focuses only on that

name: non-human-biological
description: Analytic extracts non-human biological data and focuses only on that

name: non-human-non-biological
description: Analytic extracts non-biological data and focuses only on that

name: spatial
description: Spatial distribution and arrangement of elements within media content, such as objects, shapes, and patterns.

name: spatial-structural
description: Focus on the structural features of the media content, such as the layout, composition, or arrangement of objects within the frame

name: spatial-pixel-level
description: Investigating individual pixel-level attributes of media content, such as color, intensity, and texture, to extract meaningful information

name: spatial-context
description: Contextual factors surrounding objects or scenes within media content, including their spatial relationships with other elements and their environmental context

name: spatial-provenance
description: Examine the provenance features of the media content, such as the source, origin, or chain of custody of the file based on visual signals

name: spatial-identity
description: Identifying and analyzing spatial features related to the identity of objects, individuals, or entities depicted in media content, such as facial recognition or object classification

name: spatial-physics
description: Examining spatial features influenced by physical properties and phenomena, such as lighting conditions, shadows, reflections, and perspective distortions

name: file-analysis
description: Investigating the structure, format, metadata, watermarks, and composition of media files to extract relevant information and detect anomalies or inconsistencies

name: file-metadata
description: Extracting and analyzing metadata associated with media files, including information such as creation date, authorship, location data, and device details

name: file-digital-watermark
description: Detecting and analyzing digital watermarks embedded within media files for purposes such as copyright protection, authentication, or tracking

name: temporal
description: Analyzing temporal aspects and changes in media content over time, including motion, dynamics, and temporal relationships between objects or events

name: temporal-biometrics
description: Extracting identity-specific biometric information from media content over time, such as facial expressions, gait analysis, or physiological signals for identity verification or behavioral analysis

name: temporal-physiology
description: Monitoring general species/object-specific physiological features and changes exhibited within media content over time, such as heart rate variability, pupil dilation, or facial blood flow for health monitoring or emotional analysis

name: temporal-context
description: Considering the temporal context and sequential relationships between events or actions depicted in media content, such as scene transitions, continuity, or narrative structure

name: temporal-synchronization
description: Ensuring synchronization and alignment of temporal elements within media content, such as audio-video synchronization or synchronization between different media streams

name: temporal-coherence
description: Assessing the coherence and consistency of temporal features within media content, such as smoothness of motion, temporal stability, or temporal consistency across frames

name: compression-artifacts
description: Identifying and analyzing artifacts introduced by compression algorithms during the encoding or decoding process, such as blockiness, blurring, or ringing artifacts

name: spatial-frequency
description: Extracting frequency-related characteristics from media content to identify patterns using operations involving spacial frequency transformation, such as DCT or FFT
